mapper.select:
select
from product where is_deleted=1
and product_name like CONCAT('%','${productName}','%' )
and product_title like CONCAT('%','${productTitle}','%' )
and is_home_page = #{isHomePage}

select count(*) from product where is_deleted=1
and product_name like CONCAT('%','${productName}','%' )
and product_title like CONCAT('%','${productTitle}','%' )
